repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM gcc:7



RUN apt-get update; && \
apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends bison flex && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY ./ /src/peylang
WORKDIR /src/peylang
